results.title: Australian diary. No. 027
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The marvel of mechanisation at a Melbourne Match Factory is featured in this newsreel. Hagley Area School near Launceston providing primary and trade education for country children is visited by the camera. Scientists go to Antarctica to study weather while an Australian relief crew with 12 months supplies sails to Heard Island to take over from the homecoming crew.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.title: Australian defence feature
results.creator_credit: Greg Parry and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations
results.brief_description: Three magazine-type features that have been put together to make this 24 minute film. The first segment titled ‘Cat and Arrest’ shows the training and the initial landing of Navy Skyhawk pilots on the aircraft carrier HMAS Melbourne. The second ‘On Target’ shows the clearance of potentially explosive ordnance from the Evans Head bombing range under an Air Force program while the third item ‘Rescue 036’ shows the ‘rescue’ of a pilot after a simulated helicopter crash near the Army Aviation Centre at Oakley in Queensland.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Greg Parry and Australia. Dept. of Defence. Public Relations
results.description: Three magazine-type features that have been put together to make this 24 minute film. The second ‘On Target’ shows the clearance of potentially explosive ordnance from the Evans Head bombing range under an Air Force program while the third item ‘Rescue 036’ shows the ‘rescue’ of a pilot after a simulated helicopter crash near the Army Aviation Centre at Oakley in Queensland.
